H0.text: Which planet in our solar system has the shortest year. Venus

H1.text: Which planet in our solar system has the shortest year. Mars

H2.text: Which planet in our solar system has the shortest year. Jupiter

H3.text: Which planet in our solar system has the shortest year. Mercury

A4.text: Mercury's sidereal year (88.0 Earth days) and sidereal day (58.65 Earth days) are in a 3:2 ratio
